list_definition.definition: the brown or red colour/color of the skin caused by exposure to the sun’s rays.

list_ex_of_english: Avoiding sunlight during midday is the best way to avoid blisters from sunburn.
How, moreover, can it be determined whether sunburn was sustained during leisure or at work?
Suppose one drives to the coast and gets very bad sunburn.
Paxton remembers that these things literally sunburned our eyeballs.
There was no shade in the primary viewing area and partiers were sunburned.
The result appears to be severe sunburn, although such a description underplays the disability from which he suffers.
Various viticulture problems, such as uneven grape ripening, sunburn, and frost damage, can be addressed by skillful canopy management.
Symptoms of liver damage are yawning, weight loss, poor condition, sunburn and diarrhoea.
